TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowServiceHost extends System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The WF3 types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new WF4 types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The WF3 types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new WF4 types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 为基于工作流的服务提供主机。

span.span: Provides host for workflow-based services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务模型编程模型所使用的主机。Implements the host used by the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service model programming model. 当您没有使用 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 或 Windows 激活服务 (WAS) 公开服务时，请使用 类来配置和公开工作流作为服务以供客户端应用程序使用。Use the class to configure and expose a workflow as service for use by client applications when you are not using Internet Information Services (IIS) or Windows Activation Services (WAS) to expose a service. IIS 和 WAS 均代表您与 对象交互。Both IIS and WAS interact with a object on your behalf. 若要公开工作流作为服务以供调用方使用，WCF 需要完整的服务说明（由 类表示）。To expose a workflow as service for use by callers, WCF requires a complete service description (represented by the class). 类根据工作流服务类型和配置信息创建 ，然后再使用该说明为说明中的每个终结点创建 对象。The class creates a from the workflow service type and configuration information and then uses that description to create objects for each endpoint in the description. 使用 对象可加载工作流服务、配置终结点、应用安全设置并启动侦听器来处理传入的请求。Use a object to load a workflow service, configure endpoints, apply security settings, and start listeners to handle incoming requests.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void OnClosing ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnClosing() cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnClosing ()
protected: override void OnClosing();
override this.OnClosing : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在 进入关闭状态前调用此方法。

span.span: This method is called before the is put into a closing state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在默认实现中， 将在调用 之前调用 。In the default implementation, calls before calling . 这意味着工作流运行时将在服务主机关闭前关闭。This means the workflow runtime will shut down before the service host closes.
